entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
